name: MeasureReport
title: MeasureReport
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Quality Information)
description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of the calculation of a measure; and optionally a reference to the resources involved in that calculation.

elements.name: MeasureReport
elements.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of the calculation of a measure.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this MeasureReport when it is represented in other formats or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The MeasureReport status. No data will be available until the MeasureReport status is complete.

elements.name: type
elements.description: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides the score for the measure for an individual member of the population; a subject-listing, which returns the list of members that meet the various criteria in the measure; a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure; or a data-collection, which enables the MeasureReport to be used to exchange the data-of-interest for a quality measure.

elements.name: measure
elements.description: A reference to the Measure that was calculated to produce this report.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: Optional subject identifying the individual or individuals the report is for.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date this measure report was generated.

elements.name: reporter
elements.description: The individual, location, or organization that is reporting the data.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

elements.name: improvementNotation
elements.description: Whether improvement in the measure is noted by an increase or decrease in the measure score.

elements.name: group
elements.description: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

elements.name: evaluatedResource
elements.description: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the calculation of this measure.
